nodes.text: Sea Castle Resort Hotel was a deluxe hotel suite on the water planet Praya, during the time of the Galactic Civil War. The hotel was given the rating of five stars by the Milky Way Guide, and as such was among the highest ranking hotels in the galaxy.

Sea Castle was mentioned in the post-ride queue video on the Tourscan for the Tokyo Disneyland version of the first Star Tours ride and was depicted through the use of footage of the Sea Castle optional ending of the former Epcot attraction Horizons.
